sourcesContent:
// 模拟数据，用于静态展示
export const mockPosts = [
  {
    id: 1,
    title: "欢迎来到Miko社交平台",
    content: "这是一个现代化的社交平台，支持用户互动、内容分享、私信聊天等功能。",
    author: {
      id: 1,
      username: "admin",
      nickname: "管理员",
      avatar_url: "/default-avatar.svg"
    },
    post_images: [
      {
        id: 1,
        image: "/placeholder-image.jpg",
        caption: "平台截图"
      }
    ],
    likes_count: 42,
    comments_count: 8,
    bookmarks_count: 12,
    created_at: "2024-01-15T10:00:00Z",
    is_liked: false,
    is_bookmarked: false
  },
  {
    id: 2,
    title: "功能特色介绍",
    content: "✨ 支持多图片上传\n💬 实时私信聊天\n👍 点赞收藏功能\n💭 嵌套评论系统\n👥 用户关注系统",
    author: {
      id: 2,
      username: "demo_user",
      nickname: "演示用户",
      avatar_url: "/default-avatar.svg"
    },
    post_images: [],
    likes_count: 28,
    comments_count: 5,
    bookmarks_count: 7,
    created_at: "2024-01-14T15:30:00Z",
    is_liked: true,
    is_bookmarked: false
  }
];

export const mockUser = {
  id: 1,
  username: "demo_user",
  email: "demo@example.com",
  nickname: "演示用户",
  avatar_url: "/default-avatar.svg",
  signature: "这是一个演示账号",
  bio: "欢迎体验Miko社交平台的各种功能！",
  posts_count: 5,
  followers_count: 128,
  following_count: 64,
  is_following: false
};
